name: Light The Way (itch) (KotaVR)
description: This game is an entry for the VR-Jam 2020 created by Jaime Collazo III (Kota VR) and Ken Lange. This is a VR platformer experience in which you must use lanterns to "Light The Way" and save yourself from appending doom. Be cautious... Fires do burn out eventually, Exposing you to the terrors that lie in the darkness.
